item.title: Legend Of Zelda: Echoes Of Wisdom - 7 Reasons It's Significant For The Zelda Franchise
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Zelda takes the main role for the first time, offering a new perspective in Legend of Zelda: Echoes Of Wisdom.
  • Legend of Zelda: Echoes Of Wisdom maintains an open-world format with stronger lore and story progression than its predecessor.
  • The game's graphics are inspired by the Link's Awakening remake, combining a toy-like appearance with deep storytelling elements.

The Legend of Zelda series has undergone great changes since it entered the Nintendo Switch library. The traditional Zelda formula would shift to a free-open world format with Legend of Zelda: Breath Of The Wild . The opportunities in Hyrule Kingdom were so huge that it split into two games, greatly expanding its horizons in Legend of Zelda: Tears Of The Kingdom .

This huge change was a breath of fresh air for fans, though it comes at the cost of the classic Legend of Zelda formula. The franchise’s structure changed entirely, leaving some fans nostalgic for the previous gameplay style. It’s important to see how the series will develop, especially for the next entry, Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom .

1 New Main Role

Royal Legendary Protagonist

Zelda never took the main playable role in a traditional Legend Of Zelda . She mainly supports Link, though her involvement wasn’t fully witnessed until the end of Link’s journey. Some Zeldas even have fully separate adventures on their own like Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword and Legend of Zelda: Tears Of The Kingdom . Zelda was only playable in crossover games like Hyrule Warriors and Cadence of Hyrule .

Legend of Zelda: Echoes Of Wisdom is the first time Zelda fills the protagonist role. This offers a brand new perspective as the protagonist learns how the original main character journeys, an experience Eiji Aonuma always wanted to include.

2 Land Of Hyrule

Perfect Amount Of Expansion

Hyrule Kingdom continues the open-world format in Legend of Zelda: Echoes Of Wisdom . The story pacing gives players chances to accomplish available main quests in any order. The major difference is that it doesn’t let the player immediately head to the final boss after the tutorial, which is very important for its storytelling.

How Legend of Zelda: Echoes Of Wisdom progresses makes its lore much stronger than Legend of Zelda: Tears Of The Kingdom . The lore can be acquired in the previous title, though they can be skipped when heading to the end game. Its story can also be mixed when exploring in different directions, acquiring lore in different orders, which can spoil or confuse some important moments.

3 The Graphics

Ideal Approach In Looks

Conveniently, the Legend of Zelda: Echoes Of Wisdom ’s graphics are inspired by the Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening remake. It’s designed to look more like toys, raising its approachability to a broad audience and opportunities for merchandise.

The artistic graphics were the ideal design to make the characters more memorable in appearance and expression. Eiji Aonuma yearned to use this style more after Grezzo's ideal work with Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening . While the game appears innocent, its story and lore don’t pull any punches. It has peaceful and uneasy moments during the main quest, especially when exploring the Still World.

4 Influence

Right Amount Of Freedom

Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom follows the influence of Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom ’s freedom, but in a more approachable manner. Tears of the Kingdom requires creative solutions, which can be exciting and stressful. Forcing players to think up solutions like in Minecraft can become a great burden mentally, hindering the player’s experience.

Tomomoi Sano wanted the freedom of previous titles, though she quelled them enough to avoid the overwhelming feeling. Legend of Zelda: Echoes Of Wisdom incorporates freedom while simplifying its depth. Zelda’s abilities are very powerful, though not as complex as Link’s mythical abilities like Ultrahand and Fuse.

5 Director

Brand-New Direction

Tomomoi Sano is the first female director for a Legend of Zelda game. Eiji Aonuma was the original director for the main 3D Legend of Zelda titles ever since Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess . He shifted his role to producer, supporting the developing franchise under a new beneficial vision.

Sano built her name and experience by supporting several titles such as the Mario & Luigi series and Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess HD . She also filled the role of director support for the Legend of Zelda remakes. Eiji Aonuma was interested in her work as he wanted her to be in a director support position during Legend of Zelda remake projects on 3DS and Nintendo Switch.

6 Developer Studio

Upcoming Zelda Support

Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom is the first brand-new Legend of Zelda project for Grezzo. This Japanese third-party studio cooperated with Nintendo on different projects after their supportive role in Final Fantasy 11 . They helped release various RPGs for the Nintendo 3DS like The Legend of Legacy , The Alliance Alive , and Ever Oasis .

Their relationship with Nintendo deepened during participation in their major first-party series, especially Legend of Zelda . Their support in the remakes of Ocarina of Time , Majora’s Mask , and Link’s Awakening prepared the team to create a new experience for the series. Eiji Aonuma was very impressed with the developers’ approach to Link’s Awakening , especially with their creative dungeons.

7 Authenticity

The Revival Of Nostalgic Vibes

Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom brings back the familiar authentic Zelda feeling through its dungeon and bosses. Tears of the Kingdom still has the authentic Zelda vibes, though not as strong as its previous entries. The essential dungeon items like small keys, compasses, and dungeon maps weren’t needed since Link’s abilities were powerful enough to bypass the dungeons’ intended routes and puzzles. Bosses weren’t too challenging since they couldn’t adapt well to the player’s diverse playstyles and arsenals of tools.

While Echoes of Wisdom does bring back the familiar formula, it doesn't erase the creative ideas from Breath Of The Wild . Tomomoi Sano made the game require players to think, but also not limit the solution to one answer. It mixes traditional and modern structures to craft what fans could play over and over for generations to come.

item.title: Bizarre Zelda: Ocarina of Time Mod Adds Pikmin to the Game
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Modder combines Pikmin with Ocarina of Time, showcasing Pikmin's helpfulness.
  • Video demonstrates Link using Pikmin to attack, carry, and fix objects.
  • Mod not available to public due to potential legal issues with Nintendo.

A Zelda: Ocarina of Time modder has combined Pikmin with the game with a surprising level of detail put into it. A gameplay video demonstrates what Link's newfound Pikmin can do, which turn out to be surprisingly helpful in Ocarina of Time .

While Pikmin isn't as well-known as Zelda in the west, both have become well-loved Nintendo titles over the years. Normally, Pikmin games follow characters like Olimar, who gather Pikmin to help assist them on their mission or journey. The small plant-like creatures can accomplish a wide variety of tasks and can readily be replaced if lost or killed, making them valuable assistants. It seems that helpful nature extends past the Pikmin games, courtesy of this modder.

Ocarina of Time modder notChase has shared a brief video demonstrating what it would be like if Pikmin were in the game. The video starts with Link leaving Castle Town and immediately pulling Pikmin out of the ground, just like one would in a Pikmin game. From there, the video shifts between different scenarios, including Link running through Hyrule Field with a veritable army of Pikmin. Link uses the Pikmin to attack monsters, pick up things out of reach, move and carry objects, and even fix the bridge leading to Gerudo Valley.

What Else Can Link's Pikmin Do?

While the aforementioned details are impressive enough on their own, notChase took the Pikmins' colors and types into consideration, as well. For example, Red Pikmin can be seen surviving in the hottest parts of Death Mountain while all the others perish from the heat, and in another shot, most Pikmin drown in water, but Blue Pikmin get through just fine. Link can also organize his Pikmin on-command, where the color-coordinated group can be seen marching along behind him.

Unfortunately, while this mod looks like it would be a lot of fun to tinker with, it's not available to the public. NotChase has created numerous Zelda mods that have intrigued fans, but it seems like they're more like personal experiments for the creator. Sadly, it may be for the best, as Nintendo is notorious for its litigious nature, and has forced numerous mods and fan games to shut down over the years. Releasing a mod combining two different Nintendo games could definitely draw the company's ire. For the foreseeable future, fans who want to see Link interacting with Pikmin will have to settle for playing Super Smash Bros . For those who just want the inherent crossovers in Ocarina of Time , there's always the Mario Easter eggs or the hidden Starfox development tool.

item.title: Stardew Valley Fan Creates Impressive Real-Life Version of Leah’s Sculpture
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • A fan 3D-printed Leah's Sculpture from Stardew Valley, impressing the community with its accuracy and wood-like finish.
  • Fans on Reddit appreciate the new perspective of Leah's Sculpture in real life, with over 11K upvotes.
  • The creator, KevinMakesCoolThings, shared the creation process and design files.

A Stardew Valley player has put their 3D-printing skills to impressive use, creating a real-life version of Leah’s Sculpture. Stardew Valley fan art sometimes shows reimaginings of popular characters, places, and items from the game, and the game’s community thinks this 3D-printed replica of Leah’s Sculpture made the transition from pixel art to a real-world model incredibly well.

The world of Stardew Valley is home to many characters that help the game feel alive. Among the NPCs players can build a relationship with is Leah, one of the six bachelorettes in Stardew Valley . In addition to having an affinity with nature, Leah is an artist and has some of her pieces of work featured in her cottage outside of Pelican Town. After reaching six hearts with Leah, players are gifted one of her sculptures, which can be placed inside their home. Recently, one fan completed a project imagining a real-life version of this Stardew Valley object.

The fan known as KevinMakesCoolThings on Reddit shared a picture of their real-life recreation of Leah’s Sculpture in a post. Besides the 3D-printed object, the creator included an image of the in-game piece of Stardew Valley furniture, revealing the impressive accuracy of their interpretation of the pixel art design. While their real-life creation had a smoother surface, the art piece featured the same iconic spiral of the in-game design. They also managed to give the 3D-printed object a wood-like finish.

Stardew Valley Fan 3D Prints Leah's Sculpture

This 3D reimaging of Leah’s Sculpture has caught the attention of numerous fans on the game’s subreddit. Among the comments, many said the real-life rendition of the artwork gave them a new appreciation for the design, with some claiming Leah’s Sculpture from Stardew Valley looked better in 3D. The Reddit post from KevinMakesCoolThings has already gained over 11K upvotes, and the artist revealed the files for Leah’s Sculpture are available on Thingiverse for those interested in giving it a shot.

In addition to showcasing the finished design on Reddit, KevinMakesCoolThings made a YouTube video walking through the steps involved in creating the real-life version of the Stardew Valley item. According to the creator, the design was made in Blender, with the original pixel art used as a reference. After printing the object, they sanded, primed, and painted it to get the desired final product.

This impressive 3D-printed version of Leah’s Sculpture continues the trend of fans creating impressive artwork based on the game. From paintings and quilts to giant LEGO recreations of Stardew Valley ’s world, the lengths gamers will go to showcase their love for the game are immense. Hopefully, these fan projects will help make the wait for the release of Stardew Valley Update 1.6 on consoles and mobile more bearable for players on those platforms.

item.title: Elden Ring: 11 Best Talismans For Intelligence Builds
item.description:
Elden Ring talismans are among some of the most important items that players can equip to their created character. Right behind armor and weapons, talismans should not be overlooked, especially within certain character builds. Talismans in Elden Ring withhold unique abilities and effects that can alter the way different mechanics work in the game, and even boost stats for the player.

In intelligence builds, which are some of the most popular builds in Elden Ring , there are plenty of talismans to take advantage of in creating the best intelligence builds. Pair these talismans up with the best staffs and intelligence armor, and players have themselves a worthy magic build.

Updated September 30, 2024 by Erik Petrovich : In Elden Ring, Magic talismans come in many forms as there are a lot of different types of spellcaster builds in the game. There are some that empower more than just Spells, like the Godfrey Icon, and some that are only useful for spellcaster builds in Elden Ring, like the Radagon Icon. One of the best talismans for mages in Elden Ring that was added in the DLC is the Beloved Stardust talisman. This Talisman makes all of your Sorcery and Incantation spells significantly faster to cast, but you will take a lot more damage with it equipped. This guide to the best magic talismans Elden Ring players can collect has been updated to include this powerful, but deadly, new option. Additionally, this ranking has been re-arranged to more appropriately rank the best mage talismans Elden Ring offers.

11 Ancestral Spirit Horn

FP Restoration When Enemies Die Nearby

Talisman Weight

Talisman Primary Effect

Talisman Secondary Effect

1.2

Restores 3 FP upon defeating enemies

N / A

The Ancestral Spirit Horn is a go-to talisman for any players that have a focus on FP usage in Elden Ring. That's because the Ancestral Spirit Horn talisman allows players to recover FP whenever they defeat an enemy.

This talisman is arguably much better in PVE than it is in PVP, so any players utilizing an intelligence build to fight the various enemies in the Lands Between should make use of this talisman.

How To Get Ancestral Spirit Horn

To obtain Ancestral Spirit Horn, players must defeat the Regal Ancestor Spirit boss in Nokron and use the Remembrance of the Regal Ancestor to purchase the talisman in the Roundtable Hold.

10 Marika's Soreseal

Extra Stats, But Damage Taken Is Increased

Talisman Weight

Talisman Primary Effect

Talisman Secondary Effect

0.8

Increases Mind, Int, Faith, Arc by 5

Increases damage taken by 15%

Marika's Soreseal is one of the best talismans for intelligence users in Elden Ring . The talisman is often confused with its lesser counterpart, Marika's Scarseal, but players should make use of Marika's Soreseal as it is stronger in comparison.

Marika's Soreseal boosts the mind, intelligence, faith, and arcane stats by five points each. Essentially, that is twenty levels divided between those stats. In return, the player takes 15% more damage.

How To Get Marika's Soreseal

To obtain the talisman, players must delve into Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. Head north from the Prayer Room Site of Lost Grace, then travel to the southern end of the rampart where the Erdtree Avatar patrols. Jump down at the very end to reach a Stonesword Key statue-sealed door.

9 Graven-School Talisman

Slightly Boosts Power Of All Sorceries

Talisman Weight

Talisman Primary Effect

Talisman Secondary Effect

0.7

Raises the potency of Sorceries by 4%

N / A

The Graven-School Talisman is essentially the less powerful version of the Graven-Mass Talisman. Other than sharing comparable names, the Graven-School Talisman also raises the damage dealt by sorceries, but by 4% rather than 8%.

The Graven-School Talisman stacks with the Graven-Mass Talisman, giving players a boost to their sorcery damage by 12%.

How To Get Graven-School Talisman

​​​​​​To obtain this talisman, players must travel to the Raya Lucaria Academy and get past an Illusory Wall just before the Debate Parlor (where the Red Wolf of Radagon boss is fought).

8 Graven-Mass Talisman

Strengthens The Power of All Sorceries

Talisman Weight

Talisman Primary Effect

Talisman Secondary Effect

1.0

Greatly raises the potency of Sorceries by 8%

N / A

The Graven-Mass Talisman is thrown around the community of Elden Ring as being the most important aspect of an intelligence build.

That is because the Graven-Mass talisman increases the damage done by sorceries by an incredible 8%. This goes for the damage done by all types of sorceries.

How To Get Graven-Mass Talisman

If players wish to seek out the Graven-Mass Talisman, they must travel to the Consecrated Snowfield. The Graven-Mass Talisman will simply be found lying within a chest atop Albinauric Rise.

7 Radagon Icon

Shorter Casting Time With No Drawbacks

Talisman Weight

Talisman Primary Effect

Talisman Secondary Effect

0.7

Shortens the casting time of all Spells

N / A

The Radagon Icon is an important talisman if players utilizing intelligence wish to wield magic against other players and invaders in Elden Ring's PVP. The Radagon Icon shortens the player's casting time for sorceries and most incantations.

Reportedly, this adds 30 dexterity towards spell-casting, while spell-casting speed caps at 70 dexterity. Players who don't level up dexterity much should definitely make use of Radagon's Icon.

How To Get Radagon Icon

​​​​​​To obtain the Radagon Icon, players must reach the second floor of the Debate Parlor room. Head outside from the Debate Parlor and immediately turn right. Jump over the railing, then go up the ladder to reach the second floor and the chest containing this Talisman.

6 Beloved Stardust

Incredibly Fast Casting Speed, But At Great Cost

Talisman Weight

Talisman Primary Effect

Talisman Secondary Effect

1.3

Shortens the casting time for all Spells (Sorceries and Incantations) by the highest amount in the game

Increases damage taken by 30%

The Beloved Stardust Talisman is one of the best Elden Ring Intelligence Talismans, but it's one of the few that has a noticeable downside. Like Marika's Soreseal , Beloved Stardust grants an exceptionally powerful bonus at the cost of taking significantly more damage.

With this equipped, you will cast Sorceries and Incantations significantly faster, faster than with the Radagon Icon equipped. But you will also take about 30% more damage. If you are committed to the ranged Spell build, and are good at avoiding incoming damage, consider equipping this over the Radagon Icon. But its relatively small extra casting speed bonus is not worth the extra incoming damage if you don't rely on Spells.

How To Get Beloved Stardust

The Beloved Stardust talisman location is in the Cathedral of Manus Metyr. Begin Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers 's questline, and return to him after completing the first step. For sounding the bells in the Finger Ruins he guides the Tarnished to, he will reward the Beloved Stardust talisman.

5 Primal Glintstone Blade

Reduces FP Required For All Sorceries & Incantations

Talisman Weight

Talisman Primary Effect

Talisman Secondary Effect

0.6

Reduces all FP costs for all Spells by 25%

Reduces Max HP by 15%

The Primal Glintstone Blade talisman will allow players to use spells more often. The way that this talisman works, is by reducing the FP cost of spells by 25%, but in return, the player's health is also reduced by 8.5%.

The talisman's effects on a player's intelligence build are extraordinary, so the downside is easy to look over.

How To Get Primal Glintstone Blade

Players can find the Primal Glintstone Blade by heading to the Stargazer's Ruins and summoning their Spirit Jellyfish near the other jellyfish. This will open up a secret entrance in which players can find the talisman.

4 Moon Of Nokstella

Adds Two Memory Slots

Talisman Weight

Talisman Primary Effect

Talisman Secondary Effect

0.8

Increases Memory Slots by 2

N / A

Players who spend a lot of time switching between different spells and having fun with each one will adore the Moon of Nokstella . The Moon of Nokstella, upon equipping it, will immediately increase the player's memory slots by 2.

There's no catch either. This means that players can equip two more spells to their current build.

How To Get Moon Of Nokstella

To collect the Moon of Nokstella, players will have to battle their way through Nokstella, Eternal City towards the highest point accessible in the area. The talisman will lie under a grand throne, which a few enemies will guard.

3 Old Lord's Talisman

All Sorcery and Incantation Durations Increased By 30%

Talisman Weight

Talisman Primary Effect

Talisman Secondary Effect

0.5

Extends the duration of all Spells by 30%

N / A

The Old Lord's Talisman is a wonderful talisman that players can equip to their character in order to buff their spells' duration time. The Old Lord's Talisman will increase the duration time of spells by a whopping 30%.

This goes for healing spells as well, such as Blessing of the Erdtree.This pairs well with many intelligence sorceries that have lasting effects.

How To Get Old Lord's Talisman

To obtain the Old Lord's Talisman, head to the Great Bridge Site of Grace and go into a building with a balcony. Go down a ladder from this balcony to get to a Rotunda, which houses the chest containing this Tlaismna.

2 Magic Scorpion Charm

Boosts All Outgoing Magic Damage

Talisman Weight

Talisman Primary Effect

Talisman Secondary Effect

0.8

Increases all Magic damage by 12%

Increases all Physical damage taken by 10%

The Magic Scorpion Charm is part of a series of similar talismans that boost various elements' damage. In the Magic Scorpion Charm's case, the talisman boosts the magic damage by 12%.

With that much of a boost, it is only reasonable that the talisman also increases the physical damage taken by the player by 10%.

How To Get Magic Scorpion Charm

To obtain this incredible talisman, players must seek out the Amber Starlight and deliver the item to Preceptor Seluvis after the NPC tells the player about his plan. If Seluvis is dead, the player is unable to obtain the talisman.

1 Godfrey Icon

All Charged Spells & Skills Get Much Stronger

Talisman Weight

Talisman Primary Effect

Talisman Secondary Effect

0.8

Raises the power of all Charged Spells and Charged Skills by 15%

N / A

The Godfrey Icon talisman, which depicts Godfrey on the item, boosts the power of charged spells and skills by an incredible 15%. This allows for spells that have the ability to be charged to deal more damage and pack more of a punch against various enemies.

This even works for Stars of Ruin, one of the best sorceries in the game. To make things even easier, the boss that rewards this item is not Godrick, but a boss that is essentially Godrick the Grafted without a second phase.

How To Get Godfrey Icon

To collect the Godfrey Icon talisman, players will need to take on Godefroy the Grafted in the Golden Lineage Evergaol, just off the road in the southwestern Altus Plateau (not inside the city gates).

item.title: Roblox: MMA Legends Codes (October 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All MMA Legends Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for MMA Legends
  • How to Get More MMA Legends Codes

MMA Legends is an intense and great action-packed fighting game with a simple but enjoyable setting, innovative mechanics, and convenient gameplay, which makes it a level more advanced than other similar Roblox experiences. The essence of the game is simple - look for opponents and prove to them that you are the king of the ring in a fierce fistfight.

Redemption of MMA Legends codes is a great opportunity to diversify the gameplay because you will get a lot of useful rewards. For the rewards received, including currency, you can customize your character to make it comfortable and easy to play.

All MMA Legends Codes

Working MMA Legends Codes

  • 5kLikes - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards. (You need three Wins to redeem this code)
  • 10kFavorites - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards. (You need three Wins to redeem this code)
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 3,000 Cash and three Spins.

Expired MMA Legends Codes

There are currently no expired MMA Legends codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming MMA Legends codes will be useful for both beginners and experienced players. The rewards you get will serve as a great boost to level up your character, or at least customize it, such as changing the fighting style, so don't neglect it.

How to Redeem Codes for MMA Legends

Redeeming MMA Legends codes is not difficult, and moreover, the local redemption system is common among other Roblox games, so experienced players will definitely have no problems with receiving rewards. If you are a beginner and have not redeemed codes before, or do not know how it works in MMA Legends , here is a detailed guide for you:

  • Launch MMA Legends .
  • Pay attention to the right side of the screen. There will be three buttons arranged in a column. Among them, interact with the third one, which says Codes.
  • This will open the Rewards menu. Here, scroll to the very bottom, where you will find the redemption section.
  • The redemption section will contain an input field and a green Redeem button next to it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done, you will see a notification below the redemption menu with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More MMA Legends Codes

To find more Infection MMA Legends codes, you'll need to spend some time monitoring the game's official social media. Here, you can find Roblox codes, news, and announcements, so be careful not to miss anything:

  • Official MMA Legends Roblox group.
  • Official MMA Legends game page.
  • Official MMA Legends Discord server.
